Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We are going to create an event log with one row per event per case order_id Steps 1 Identify the events we can extract from each table 2 For each event we need Case ID order_id Activity Name a descriptive name for the activity Timestamp the time when the event occurred Resource Actor if available Other attributes we might include item_id quantity etc if relevant

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Events we can extract From Orders table Event Order Created Case ID order_id Timestamp order_date Resource sales_person_id Other attributes customer_id customer_type order_priority From Order Lines table Event Item Picked one event per line item Case ID order_id Timestamp item_picking_date Resource picker_id Other attributes item_id quantity From Delivery table We have two events per delivery a Order Dispatched b Order Arrived

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: From Invoice table Event Invoice Issued Case ID order_id Timestamp invoice_issue_date Resource billing_person_id Other attributes invoice_id invoice_amount From Payments table Event Payment Received one event per payment Case ID via invoice to get order_id Timestamp payment_date Resource no resource Other attributes payment_method payment_reference payment_id invoice_id

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Steps to combine We are going to create a list of events for each order We will generate events from each table and then combine them Important We must ensure that the events are in chronological order per case Lets list all events per order For order_id 1001 From Orders Event Order Created timestamp 2024-01-01T09:00:00Z resource SP-001 From Order Lines two line items Item Picked for ITEM-001 at 2024-01-02T10:15:00Z by WH-001 Item Picked for ITEM-002 at 2024-01-02T11:00:00Z by WH-002

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Implementation We are going to create a list of events Each event is a dictionary with case_id activity_name timestamp resource attributes But note the output format requires a table with columns We are going to have Case ID Activity Name Timestamp Resource Item ID Quantity Delivery ID Invoice ID Payment ID Amount Payment Method Payment Reference Delivery Note

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Steps Well iterate over each order and generate events from each table Precomputation orders list order_lines_dict deliveries_dict invoices_dict invoice_to_order_map payments_dict by order_id Then for each order add Order Created Item Picked events Delivery Dispatched and Arrived Invoice Issued Payment Received Then sort events by Case ID Timestamp Activity Name

Name: Validation - PE
Text: For order_id 1004 Order Created 2024-01-04T14:15:00Z Item Picked ITEM-001 2024-01-06T08:00:00Z no delivery invoice or payment So events for 1004 Order Created Item Picked We include what we have Now we must generate the table Assumptions We use carrier_id as the resource for delivery events We leave resource as NULL for payment events We sort by Case ID Timestamp Activity Name
